hosts.name: Getspace
hosts.notes: VPS is too expensive, but they've got some cool other services. You can easily sign up and get 50GB drive space free.

hosts.name: Resellers Panel
hosts.notes: Nothing to see in terms of VPS, but there is an intriguing data hosting plan with "Unlimited SSD Storage, 100 E-mail Accounts, Ulimited Monthly Traffic" for $2.50/mo.

hosts.name: TIME4VPS
hosts.notes: Entry VPS option would be a better deal if they didn't encrease the price at renewal. However, their 1.49 EUR/mo. 'Storage VPS' plan looks stellar. It notably offers 256GB of storage and 2TB of bandwidth along with a tiny bit of CPU and RAM so it does seem to be a full VPS.

hosts.name: HeroHosty
hosts.notes: Their VPS offerings are too expensive, but their entry level 'Shared Hosting' and 'Cloud Hosting' packages are cheap (around the ~$1.00 mark) so that might be useful. I can't desirn their restrictions.

hosts.name: KRYSTAL
hosts.notes: Prices aren't what we are looking for but the company seems just fabulous. They are 100% green energy powered and human centric. If you've got a little extra money then definitely consider this company.

hosts.name: VIRMACH
hosts.notes: Good and to the point. VPS starting at $1/mo.
